scripts.dv-start-all: concurrently "npm run dv-start-childauthentication" "npm run dv-start-parentauthentication" "npm run dv-start-childauthorization" "npm run dv-start-parentauthorization" "npm run dv-start-market" "npm run dv-start-group" "npm run dv-start-task" "npm run dv-start-reward" "npm run dv-start-child" "npm run dv-start-chore" "npm run dv-start-gateway"
scripts.dv-start-parentauthentication: if [ -f node_modules/authentication/server/server.js ]; then node node_modules/authentication/server/server.js  --config "`dv get usedCliches.parentauthentication.config`" --as parentauthentication; else echo "No file"; fi;
scripts.dv-start-watch-parentauthentication: if [ -f node_modules/authentication/server/server.js ]; then nodemon -w node_modules/authentication/server node_modules/authentication/server/server.js -- --config "`dv get usedCliches.parentauthentication.config`" --as parentauthentication; else echo "No file"; fi;
scripts.dv-start-childauthentication: if [ -f node_modules/authentication/server/server.js ]; then node node_modules/authentication/server/server.js  --config "`dv get usedCliches.childauthentication.config`" --as childauthentication; else echo "No file"; fi;
scripts.dv-start-watch-childauthentication: if [ -f node_modules/authentication/server/server.js ]; then nodemon -w node_modules/authentication/server node_modules/authentication/server/server.js -- --config "`dv get usedCliches.childauthentication.config`" --as childauthentication; else echo "No file"; fi;
scripts.dv-start-parentauthorization: if [ -f node_modules/authorization/server/server.js ]; then node node_modules/authorization/server/server.js  --config "`dv get usedCliches.parentauthorization.config`"; else echo "No file" --as parentauthorization; fi;
scripts.dv-start-watch-parentauthorization: if [ -f node_modules/authorization/server/server.js ]; then nodemon -w node_modules/authorization/server node_modules/authorization/server/server.js -- --config "`dv get usedCliches.parentauthorization.config`" --as parentauthorization; else echo "No file"; fi;
